description: Non-technical, real-world requests to evaluate minimal prompting, reuse, and file-first outputs without biasing solutions.

experiments.title: Project intro with optional details
experiments.prompt: I'm new here. In two or three short paragraphs, tell me what this project does and how to get it running. If there are lots of details, save them somewhere so I can read them later.

experiments.title: Refresh intro details
experiments.prompt: I might share that later. Please refresh or improve the detailed version you saved, and keep the short summary short.

experiments.title: Shutdown risk overview
experiments.prompt: I'm worried about losing work if the server stops suddenly. Give me the five biggest risk areas and point me to where they're handled in the project.

experiments.title: Ways to interact with the app
experiments.prompt: List the ways a person or another system can interact with this app. Keep the full list somewhere; just show a short list here.

experiments.title: What is required to run
experiments.prompt: Tell me everything I need to provide to run this app (keys, settings, files). If it's long, keep a full checklist somewhere and give me a short version here.
